scoring_project.scoring_project

Class HTMLScorer

  • java.lang.Object
    • scoring_project.scoring_project.HTMLScorer

  • public class HTMLScorer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class attains the functionality for the program. It calculates scores, retrieves all scores, retrieves all scores within a date range, retrieves highest/lowest score, or retrieves average score for a specified file. It can also close the SQL connection.
    Author:
    Courtney Ripoll

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HTMLScorer(java.lang.String password)
      Constructs the HTML Scorer program

    • Method Detail

      • calculateScore

        public void calculateScore(java.lang.String fileName)
        Calculates the score for a given html file. After calculating the score, it gets added to the MySQL database.
        Parameters:
        fileName - file to calculate a score for

      • retrieveAllScores

        public java.lang.String retrieveAllScores(java.lang.String fileName)
        Retrieves all scores in the database for the specified file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - file to find scores with
        Returns:
        a table listing all the scores for the file name

      • retrieveAllScoresDateRange

        public java.lang.String retrieveAllScoresDateRange(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                   java.lang.String date1,
                                                   java.lang.String date2)
        Retrieves all scores in the database for the specified file within a date range.
        Parameters:
        fileName - file to find scores with
        date1 - starting date
        date2 - ending date
        Returns:
        a table listing all the scores for the file name between the desired dates

      • retrieveHighestScore

        public java.lang.String retrieveHighestScore(java.lang.String fileName)
        Retrieves the highest score for a given file
        Parameters:
        fileName - file to find the score with
        Returns:
        highest score for the file name

      • retrieveLowestScore

        public java.lang.String retrieveLowestScore(java.lang.String fileName)
        Retrieves the lowest score for a given file
        Parameters:
        fileName - file to find the score with
        Returns:
        lowest score for the file name

      • retrieveAverageScore

        public java.lang.String retrieveAverageScore(java.lang.String fileName)
        Retrieves the average score for a given file
        Parameters:
        fileName - file to find the scores and calculate the average score
        Returns:
        overall average score for the file name

        public void closeSQLConnection()
        Closes the connections to the MySQL database
